Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: Maria's is an intimate Italian restaurant that serves great food. I've been dining at Maria's for a few years. I've had lunch and dinner here. I had my engagement dinner here. The wait staff are friendly and attentive. I've never had a bad meal here. Highly recommended.

Name: Maria Ristorante

Review Text: After seeing "Green Book" on a Sunday afternoon, our taste for Italian cuisine was heightened. We stopped at Maria's and was not disappointed. We were warmly greeted by staff and seated immediately. In the dining room there was an energetic ‚Ä¶

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: Old fashioned feeling.  Wonderful service.  Good Italian food. Fabulous desserts made by Maria.  A happy place!

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: My $12 tuna Hoagie that I waited 30 minutes for was a great surprise to find nothing in the middle of it when I got home!!! What business owner would let this kind of food leave the kitchen?? What a disgrace! Thanks for reminding me why I live across the street for four years and haven't stepped foot in since 4 years ago!

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: I really like this place. Food is good, prices reasonable. Have done take out and dine in. The pizza is one of the best in the area. My only complaint is on Friday when we went there the server was not wearing a mask. I felt uncomfortable ‚Ä¶

Review Text: The Best F@#!%IN Cheesesteak Stromboli In Philly!!! If you don't know you know NOW... Period

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: Met a friend here for lunch. I had never been to Maria's before, but it's a neighborhood gem, for sure. Eat in. Take out. Bar. A predictable pizza/Italian menu but all solidly prepared, in a warm, multi-room space. Service was friendly and excellent. I would definitely go back.

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: This place was a hidden gem. Went for a work Christmas lunch.  Everyone enjoyed their food.  Great service.  My office mates and I sampled each other's food. The crab cakes were lump, very little filler with a delicious sauce. The fried ‚Ä¶

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: I ordered delivery dinners from Maria's for my son and his girlfriend as they were recuperating at home! I live 3 hours away, but Jenna was SO very helpful and pleasant on the phone as I placed my order with questions! 5 stars for Jenna! My ‚Ä¶

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: Amazing! Words can't describe how great this place is. We had soup, bread and a delicious entree. The portions are huge. And you have to try the desert. Make sure to save room.

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: Service was slow. We sat down at 6:30 and ordered. Didn't get our soup and salad until 7:30. My lasagna was over cooked. Expected much better. Restaurant wasn't that busy. Maybe 4 or 5 other tables were seated.

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: Never fails to deliver, whether your lookin for pizza or pasta or a great salad. Marias food us amazing! If you get the chance to grab a dessert, you won't be dissapointed!

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: Absolutely Recommended. I've been customer for about 8 years..with good reason..their food is consistently really really good. And i must emphasize the consistency.  Love the diversity of dishes from different areas in Italy ( ie..the fried ‚Ä¶

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: Great food. Never had a bad meal there.

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: Food is pretty good but don‚Äôt order take out unless you don‚Äôt mind waiting a couple of hours to get your food. We have ordered delivery a few times from there and it‚Äôs always taken over an hour ( we live about 2 miles away) but last night ‚Ä¶

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: We visited Maria's for the first time yesterday. We were there for a funeral luncheon.  We were seated promptly and offered a drink. I had the iced tea and it really was delicious.  Our wait staff Nancy and Colleen couldn't have been nicer ‚Ä¶

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: One of my favorite places to get pizza in the area. Crust is delicious and always hits the spot. Their buffalo chicken and barbecue chicken pizzas are one of my all time favorites. Fries are decent as well. Good place for take out if you're in the area!

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: This would be a five star restaurant if  the owners would streamline the kitchen .The hostess, wait staff and food is very good. The head chef is great. Other than the time it takes to get your food from the time you place your order is way ‚Ä¶

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: Wonderful food and waitstaff. They include you as part of the family. Little known secret: if you aren't 100% happy with an entire or menu item...they will make it the way you want it. For example they might have a pasta specoal with ‚Ä¶

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: I go to this great spot quite a bit! This is the best place to eat.  I visit this place regularly. The meals are very tasty, the crew is courteous and the payment is decent. I enjoy meeting in this spot over a good lunch.

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: Food and upscale atmosphere are always stellar. Service is usually on point with food knowledge and a friendly yet professional family style. If you want a take your time celebration of American-Italian food with a wider variety of ‚Ä¶

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: Great food, great service. A real neighborhood staple.

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: Awesome little place to sit down and enjoy a meal. The decorations on the inside are really pretty, not what you might expect when you walk in off the streets. I also got takeout on a separate occasion- it was a bit pricey, but my calzone was amazing, practically oozing with cheese.

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: My girlfriend and I went here for the first time cause we know someone who works there. We were so surprised at what we got. We waited awhile for the food but it was so worth it. The food was amazing for the wait. The staff is extremely friendly. I would def go there again. If you go, you will not be disappointed.

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: Food is fair.  In my opinion, lacking in basic "Italian" flavors; like garlic...üòÜ.  Many of the pasta items are cream based which is not my preference.  Make sure YOU ask them to tell you about the daily specials.  The specials are ‚Ä¶

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: The food here is very good if you don't mind the long wait for your food. The waitress was very nice, but it should not take over 20 minutes to receive your drink order and another 40 minutes to receive appetizers. Very slow service.

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: Ordered Clams in linguine with white sauce.  Amazing. Best I've ever had. My husband had the chicken parmigiana.  He loved it. ‚Ä¶

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: Food is downright delicious. I have never had a bad meal here. Only downside is the wait staff, who are too busy playing grab @ss at times to pay close attention to their guests. Overall, the food makes up for it. Simply some of the best food in Philly... for a price that won't break your bank.

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: Quality Italian and American food at competitive prices. Casual dining in a relaxed atmosphere. Happy hour at the bar from 4 - 6  with a special menu  will give you a preview of the quality dining ahead. Courteous and friendly staff make this a fond memorable experience.

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: Very good food, and excellent customer service

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: I've been there three times now. Each time I have been impressed by the food but NOT by the staff. I've waited at the hostess stand, only to turn the corner and see everyone huddled in a corner paying no attention to the guests. Once we're ‚Ä¶

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: The food is quite good. Authentic Italian. I wish that it were a little more open..not as cramped. Large parties in a very small room can make the experience quite noisy.  They are overdue a menu change; it's boring for frequent diners; bracciole would be a nice addition and maybe more seafood...change it up!

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: We where her after a funeral so we had a limited selection. However what we had was very good. Service was great.

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: Food was excellent as well as the service.

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: One of my best meals.  Great beers, I had Goose IPA.  My filet was so perfectly cooked, I've not seen steaks I've let rest for 15 minutes look and taste so good, and bleed so little.  My veggies were crisp-tender, the portion was perfect.  Patronize this restaurant!

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: I tried this place for the first time last night with 3 other people in my party. We arrived around 9:15 with no reservations and they happily sat us even though it was clearly the end of the night  they have a nice menu.  The food was ‚Ä¶

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text:
Food was great in terms of taste, quantity and price.

Items ordered: baked penne and cheese with chicken and penne with blush sauce. ‚Ä¶

Name: Maria Ristorante

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: A perfect example of what you get when people take no pride in their work and dont care about their jobs. Food is fine, but I cant ever get any of it! Most of the time when I order I get something that is not what I ordered, or just food ‚Ä¶

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: Authentic and affordable Italian classic dishes, with formal dining room or casual bar setting. Desserts made fresh by the owner. Attentive servers. Will be back.

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: The bartender Mary is an exceptional bartender! She has a working knowledge of the drink/food menue, and can multitask, while holding a conversation! (Fun, casual place, with an exceptional selection of food and spirits!!) Good job Dino

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: The food is decent and you never have to wait for a table.  Downside is that the staff is mostly made up of really lazy teenagers.  Don't drink your water too fast as it might not be filled back up.  Also, don't plan on getting in and out too quickly as you'll usually have to wait a bit to get your check.

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: Maria‚Äôs is by far the best local spot in the Roxborough/Manayunk area. My wife and I have been going there for 10+ years now and the food is spectacular, the staff always goes above and beyond, and it‚Äôs a fun and classy atmosphere. Also, a great place to bring family and friends! Keep doing what you are doing!!

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: hands down best veal piccata on East coast

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: We went to a luncheon at Maria's after a funeral. It's beautifully decorated, clean, the food was amazing and the staff were super accommodating, friendly, and courteous!! Definitely recommend giving them a try.

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: The food is fresh and tastes amazing! The tables are well spaced for the cozy area you sit in. It's great for a family get together and getting great authentic Italian food!

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: My go to Italian restaurant when I'm anywhere near the north-west side of the city. Delicious food, reasonable prices, and great portions!!!! There vodka sauce is amazing!!!!

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: Always love going to Maria's when I come home to visit. Good food, great staff, warm, friendly atmosphere. Everything you want from a restaurant. Can't wait to taste the mussels in white again.

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text:
I have been to this restaurant

50 times over the years and tonight will be my last.  2 plus hours for apps and ‚Ä¶

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: Had a wonderful dinner there for my granddaughter. The food was excellent as well as the waitstaff. Can't wait to go back!

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: Had dinner here with friends on Saturday night. The food was tasty and fresh. We got here a little late as they close at 10pm. To be honest we all felt rushed to get out on time although the bar seemed as though it was still open.

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: I had really high hopes after reading the reviews, but was extremely disappointed by the food. The food had a crazy amount of salt in it and was pretty much inedible. Service is slow. Very overpriced for what you get. Really disappointed and I wouldn't recommend it.

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: Food was average,,pick up service was slow,,but they were. Busy. ,price was. Average.

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: The food here is excellent and a great value for the money. Their catering is awesome. I plan on using Maria's for all my events. They are so nice to work with.

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: Great food and friendly staff. Service was a little slow, but that didn't really detract from the enjoyment of the restaurant.

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: Correcting the post: the food is very good, the friendly service is welcome, we enjoyed dinner very much. Recommend the chicken parm...... The only downside is the lousy parking situation.

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: The food, especially the pizza is great! My wife loves the bruschetta which is saying something because tomatoes and onions, but it is freaking great!

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: Good food and service. Decent prices too! I really enjoy the atmosphere at Maria's Ristorante. Hands down my favorite restaurant in Roxborough.

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: Been here twice in the last 2 months, food has been excellent both times, as has been the super nice and attentive staff. Will be returning soon.

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: Came here today for dinner for the first time. The food was AMAZING!! The staff was also really friendly. I'd come back for sure.

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: The food , again, was excellent.  Cooked to order and the service was perfect.

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text:

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: Great Service. Superb Italian food. Out of this world desserts to GO . Bartenders and waitresses rock. Try their Pizza. 6 stars.

Review Text: I recently had my mom"s funeral luncheon there,very accommodating,great prices,great food,and the staff,Tracy & Colleen were awesome!!! Would definitely recommend Maria"s to friends.

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: We were there for a funeral luncheon. The service and the food were amazing!

Name: Maria Ristorante

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: Be very careful ordering takeout...the delivery people don't carry change, so we paid 60 bucks for a 41 dollar meal because she didn't have ANY change.  Sure she offered to return, but yea, I'm gonna mane a delivery person return for a smaller tip???

Name: Maria Ristorante
Review Text: I loved the spirit of the place and the food was amazing. They have very good alcohol too
